prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with bright orange scales and large fins.
I want a fish-like Pokemon that has a horn and playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments and has vibrant colors.
Make a creature that resembles a goldfish but with unique features and abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a sleek, elongated body and powerful swimming skills.
Design a Pokemon that can blend into coral reefs with its vivid orange coloration.
Show me a Pokemon with a striking appearance and a strong connection to the sea.
